revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=XR500 |revision=
(Nighthawk Pro Gaming) |series=AC2600 |asin=B078GWJ44Z |newegg=9SIAB278JT9892 |price=300 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |est_release_date=01/08/2018 |fcc_date= |fcc_id=PY315100319 |pcb_id=29764958 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, DFS, |stock_os=Linux;;DumaOS; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip= http://www.routerlogin.net |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk Pro Gaming Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.netgear.com/npg/xr500/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=XR500}} *[https://kb.netgear.com/000053094/How-do-I-log-in-to-the-router-interface-of-my-XR500-Nighthawk-gaming-router Web GUI]: http://www.routerlogin.net *OEM: [[Delta Networks]] - Board ID: 29764958 :Hardware ID: 29764958+0+256+512+4x4+4x4+Cascade {{See also|Netgear XR450|Netgear XR700|Netgear}} :TurboQAM enabled on 2.4GHz 802.11n radio (800Mbps) ===Forum threads=== *[https://community.netgear.com/t5/Nighthawk-Pro-Gaming-Routers/Introducing-Nighthawk-Pro-Gaming-WiFI-Router-XR500/td-p/1481350 ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming WiFI Router XR500'' on '''Netgear''' forums] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgears-ces-2018-announcements.43282/ ''Netgear CES 2018 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] :[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33178-netgear-s-ces-2018-announcements ''Netgear CES 2018 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] "What the XR500 has that the R7800 doesn't, however, is a Gaming Dashboard that shows :'real-time bandwidth utilization by device, ping delays, and many other parameters' :and a Geo Filter aimed at minimizing gaming lag by limiting distance to servers or :other players, getting a guaranteed local connection, and creating black/white lists :of your preferred servers. Other features include QoS for gaming device prioritization, :OpenVPN support and network monitor." *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/2083-netgear%C2%A0xr500-nighthawk-pro-gaming-wifi-router/ ''Netgear XR500 Nighthawk Pro Gaming WiFi Router'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===Models=== *[[Netgear XR300]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming XR300 Router'' (AC1750) • [https://www.netgear.com/gaming/xr300/ PPage] *[[Netgear XR450]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming XR450 Router'' (AC2400) • [https://www.netgear.com/gaming/xr450/ PPage] *[[Netgear XR500]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming XR500 Router'' (AC2600) • [https://www.netgear.com/gaming/xr500/ PPage] *[[Netgear XR700]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming XR700 Router'' (AD7200) • [https://www.netgear.com/gaming/xr700/ PPage] *[[Netgear XR1000]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming XR1000 Router'' (AX5400) • [https://www.netgear.com/home/online-gaming/routers/xr1000/ PPage] ===See also=== :[[List of Netgear Nighthawk Products]] :[[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices]] *[[Netgear R9000]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY316200339 PY316200339] (09/23/2016) :Nighthawk X10 - AD7200 Smart WiFi Router *[[Netgear R8500]] • FCC ID: PY315200309, PY315200310 (v1) :Nighthawk X8 - AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.anandtech.com/show/9678/netgear-nighthawk-x8-r8500-wave-2-80211ac-router-set-to-ship PR] *[[Netgear R8000]] • FCC ID: PY314200264 (10/05/2015) :Nighthawk X6 - AC3200 Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Netgear R7800]] • FCC ID: PY315200310, PY315100319 :Nighthawk X4S - AC26000 Smart Wi-Fi Router :IPQ8065 Dual-core SoC @1.7GHz and QCA9984 radio :4x4 design supports 160MHz (or 80+80MHz), MU-MIMO *[[Netgear D7800]] • FCC ID: PY315200302 :Nighthawk X4S - AC2600 VDSL/ADSL Modem Router *[[Netgear R7500]] • FCC ID: PY314100258, PY314300288 :Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Netgear R7500v2]] • FCC ID: PY315100301 :Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router *[https://fccid.io/NCC/CCAI18LP0440T9 NCC CCAI18LP0440T9] __NOTOC__
